snippet: A Navy F/A-18 Super Hornet fighter jet crashed on Tuesday shortly after it was launched from the aircraft carrier Theodore Roosevelt in the Persian Gulf. The two pilots ejected and were rescued, but the crash, which is now under investigation,...
lead_paragraph: A Navy F/A-18 Super Hornet fighter jet crashed on Tuesday shortly after it was launched from the aircraft carrier Theodore Roosevelt in the Persian Gulf. The two pilots ejected and were rescued, but the crash, which is now under investigation, underscores the daily risks facing military aviators.

headline.main: Navy F/A-18 Fighter Jet Crashes in Persian Gulf
